The Last of Us has not only defined storytelling in games but also set a new standard for video game adaptations with its critically acclaimed HBO series. Developed by Naughty Dog and originally released on June 14, 2013, the game’s emotional narrative and rich worldbuilding laid the foundation for one of the most successful cross-medium expansions in entertainment history.

From Game to TV: Staying True While Expanding

Adapting The Last of Us for television presented unique challenges. According
title: The Last of Us: How the Game Evolved into HBO’s Landmark Series
